data.message: Hi, I have tried several times to deactivate or delete an "old" FB website. I followed the instructions yet it is still appearing to those that want to friend me. It is under the name,"Linda Wren". My current website is under," Linda Ann Wren. ( Linda Naomi Wren). Would you please take care of this so that there is no more confusion? Thank you!

replies.message: My current website says "Linda Wren-Clark" please delete the old one that says,"Linda Wren ". Thank you.
Hi Linda. You can request to have your old account permanently deleted: http://bit.ly/2vFOaR7. -Brittany
Hi, thank you for your help in deleting account "Linda Ann Wren". Problem: I don't remember my password for this account. Can it still be deleted? Thank you!
Hi Linda. Yes, you can request to have the account permanently deleted after you regain access by following these steps: http://bit.ly/2uGUTgn. -Brittany
